name: Your Personal Photographer
description: Have you ever wanted amazing pictures of your special trip, but all you have is your smart phone? I have the perfect solution. Whatever you want to do, it's your day. Whether it's eating dumplings china town, the Toronto Aquarium, going to the top of the CN tower or going to check out some local music. You can plan the whole trip and I will just be fly on the wall or I can make recommendations and show you some of my favourite Toronto secrets.
